statement.p: What is the solution to \displaystyle{18}={9}{x}+{9}? Preview Question 1 Â

solution.p: \displaystyle{18}={9}{x}+{9}. We undo the \displaystyle+{9} by subtracting from both sides.
\displaystyle{9}={9}{x}. We undo the multiplication by \displaystyle{9} by dividing by \displaystyle{9} on both sides.
